name: Untold Horizons
description:
Upon awakening, Effia Clarifana did her usual daily basis to start off her day. Making breakfast, looking at the map, watching as how she dreamt of the old days with her grandpa. She then kissed on the picture she was holding, and then pinned it on the side of the big map, as if the picture gives her the power to push her forward. She then walks out of the room, and begins her journey to find her grandpa. What first caught her eyes was the beauty of the sky. Hundred or perhaps, thousand of miles up in the sky, Effy piloting her ship that grandpa left for her, searching from islands to islands, in order to find her grandpa that went missing years ago. 

Single player story-driven adventure exploration game, Untold Horizons features a whole game world that includes different country based theme floating island, where players can fully explore the continents without restrictions. Player controls character named Effy, being able to pilot the ship and also explore the islands by her own. 

Our game consist of 2 designers, 2 programmers, and 3 artists : 

Alvin Tseu |  Lead Game Designer & Project Manager | alvinjff@gmail.com
